The movie is known for its atmospheric tension and captivating storytelling.

That sounds fantastic! I'm really looking forward to diving into the mind of the serial killer and experiencing the atmospheric tension in "Manhunter (1986)". I can't wait to see the intense criminal elements, gripping suspense, and thrilling action unfold. Thank you for the recommendation! [END]
